statements: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerProfile;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM CustomerProfile WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM CustomerProfile WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerProfile WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfile WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM CustomerProfile WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT first_name AS 'First Name', email AS 'Email' FROM CustomerProfile WHERE last_name = 'Johnson';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR total_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, channel, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE channel = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, purchases.product_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_personal_info
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_personal_info WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM customer_address WHERE state = 'CA'
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_personal_info;
SELECT * FROM customer_address WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT cpi.first_name, cpi.last_name, ca.street_address, ca.city, ca.state, ca.postal_code FROM customer_personal_info cpi JOIN customer_address ca ON cpi.customer_id = ca.customer_id;
SELECT ch.customer_id, SUM(ch.purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchase_history ch GROUP BY ch.customer_id ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT ci.customer_id, ci.interaction_type, ci.interaction_date, ca.city, ca.state FROM customer_interactions ci LEFT JOIN customer_address ca ON ci.customer_id = ca.customer_id WHERE ci.interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customers.first_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
